name: Lunch Menu: 1st week (Bean Week)
comments: Customer: Are rerefried beans a thing?
School: We, the school, fries the beans every day, so rerefried beans are a thing.
Customer: Thanks for telling me that. Are rererefried beans a thing?
Customer: Are rerererefried beans a thing?
Chat Encourager (bot): It's been 3 months and 15 days without any comments. Who would like to be the first one after 3 months and 15 days?
